text: does anyone know if there is a nuget package for the latest api for c#?

According to these docs: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/webhooks/validating-requests>
Validating v2 requests consists of hashing `Client secret` + `http method` + `URI` + `request body` . We've tried almost every combination and variations we could come up with but can't seem to get the correct string to hash. Have any of you run into a similar problem? Thank you. For context, we are using flask and python.
